mapper.insert: insert into ${table} (equipment_id,light,status_value, time, DI_1, DI_2, DI_3, DI_4, DI_5, DI_6, DI_7, DI_8, cycle,original_information) values (#{equipmentId},#{light},#{status_value},#{time},#{DI_1},#{DI_2},#{DI_3},#{DI_4},#{DI_5},#{DI_6},#{DI_7},#{DI_8},#{cycle},#{original_information})
mapper.select: select count(1) from information_schema.`TABLES` where LCASE(TABLE_NAME)=#{tableName} and TABLE_SCHEMA = "ry-vue"
mapper.update: create table ${tableName} ( id int(11) primary key not null auto_increment, equipment_id varchar(50), light varchar(50), time varchar(50), status_value varchar(50), DI_1 varchar(10), DI_2 varchar(10), DI_3 varchar(10), DI_4 varchar(10), DI_5 varchar(10), DI_6 varchar(10), DI_7 varchar(10), DI_8 varchar(10), cycle varchar(50), original_information varchar(50), )
